Review Text: I loved everyone there! The owner and her colleagues were welcoming, joyful, beautiful, and overall enhanced a true Amsterdam experience for a tourist such as myself. People were great, there was a combination of tourist, locals and some dammn good music. Thank you Cafe Bouwman for a memorable night!

She behaved in a regular way with the rest of my group who did not have trouble...not just me, also a black guy received similar treatment. Avoid. Very disappointed I was picked on. Do not be anything other than white and go here...
